PendingLicenseeStatusReports.name: PendingLicenseeStatusReports
PendingLicenseeStatusReports.description: Get Excel reports for Pending Licensee Status Reports
PendingLicenseeStatusReports.queryString:
select licensee.person.firstName as name,
    licensee.licenseeNumber as licNum ,
    licensee.licencetype.shortNameEnglish as LicType,
    licensee.licenseDate as LicDate,
    licenseeclasspracticegroup.classpraticegroup.classEntity.shortNameEnglish as NewClass,
    licenseeclasspracticegroup.classpraticegroup.practicegroup.shortNameEnglish as NewPracticeGroup,
    newEffectiveFromDate as New_Effective_from_Date,
    newEffectiveToDate as New_Effective_to_Date ,
    oldEffectiveFromDate as Old_Effective_From_Date, 
    oldEffectiveToDate as Old_Effective_to_Date,
    createdDate as Created_Date
from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals where createdDate BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate and status = :status

approveEditRecord.name: approveEditRecord
approveEditRecord.description: Approve the edit LicenseeClassPracticeGroup based on the request PK
approveEditRecord.queryString:
update Licenseeclasspracticegroup a

set a.effectiveFromDate = (select b.newEffectiveFromDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.effectiveToDate = (select b.newEffectiveToDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.isPrimary = (select b.newIsPrimary from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk),

a.classPracticeGroupFk  = (select b.newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

approvedNewRecord.name: approvedNewRecord
approvedNewRecord.description: Query to Insert a New record into LicenseeClassPracticeGroup on approval
approvedNewRecord.queryString:
INSERT INTO Licenseeclasspracticegroup (licenseeFk,isPrimary,effectiveFromDate,effectiveToDate,classPracticeGroupFk)

select licenseeFk,newIsPrimary,newEffectiveFromDate,newEffectiveToDate,newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals where pk =:primaryKey

expirationStatus.name: expirationStatus
expirationStatus.description: Shows details of all Licensees which have LicenseeClassPracticeGroup(s) with Effective_To in the Input date range
expirationStatus.queryString:
select DISTINCT l.LICENSEE_NUMBER,
    p.FIRST_NAME||' '||p.LAST_NAME as Name,
    pa.ADDRESS_LINE_1||' '||pa.ADDRESS_LINE_2||' '||pa.CITY as Address,
    lt.SHORT_NAME_ENGLISH,l.LICENSE_DATE,
    c.SHORT_NAME_ENGLISH as Class,
    pg.SHORT_NAME_ENGLISH as PracticeGroup ,
    lcpg.EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE ,
    lcpg.EFFECTIVE_TO_DATE
from RMS.PERSON p,
    RMS.PERSONADDRESS pa,
    RMS.LICENSEE l,
    RMS.LICENCETYPE lt,
    RMS.LICENSEECLASSPRACTICEGROUP lcpg,
    RMS.CLASSPRATICEGROUP cpg ,
    RMS.CLASS c,
    RMS.PRACTICEGROUP pg 
where p.PK = pa.PERSON_FK and 
    l.PERSON_FK = p.PK and
    l.LICENCE_TYPE_FK = lt.PK and 
    lcpg.LICENSEE_FK = l.PK and 
    lcpg.CLASS_PRACTICE_GROUP_FK = cpg.PK and 
    cpg.CLASS_FK = c.PK and 
    cpg.PRACTICE_GROUP_FK = pg.PK
expirationStatus.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select DISTINCT l.LICENSEE_NUMBER,
    p.FIRST_NAME||' '||p.LAST_NAME as Name,
    pa.ADDRESS_LINE_1||' '||pa.ADDRESS_LINE_2||' '||pa.CITY as Address,
    lt.SHORT_NAME_ENGLISH,l.LICENSE_DATE,
    c.SHORT_NAME_ENGLISH as Class,
    pg.SHORT_NAME_ENGLISH as PracticeGroup ,
    lcpg.EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE ,
    lcpg.EFFECTIVE_TO_DATE
from RMS.PERSON p,
    RMS.PERSONADDRESS pa,
    RMS.LICENSEE l,
    RMS.LICENCETYPE lt,
    RMS.LICENSEECLASSPRACTICEGROUP lcpg,
    RMS.CLASSPRATICEGROUP cpg ,
    RMS.CLASS c,
    RMS.PRACTICEGROUP pg 
where p.PK = pa.PERSON_FK and 
    l.PERSON_FK = p.PK and
    l.LICENCE_TYPE_FK = lt.PK and 
    lcpg.LICENSEE_FK = l.PK and 
    lcpg.CLASS_PRACTICE_GROUP_FK = cpg.PK and 
    cpg.CLASS_FK = c.PK and 
    cpg.PRACTICE_GROUP_FK = pg.PK) wmTempTable

getStatusChangeDetails.name: getStatusChangeDetails
getStatusChangeDetails.description: get Status Change Details Based on PersonID
getStatusChangeDetails.queryString:
select classpraticegroup.classEntity.shortNameEnglish as Type, effectiveFromDate as EffectiveDate, effectiveToDate as EffectiveTo, CONCAT(classpraticegroup.practicegroup.code,' - ', classpraticegroup.practicegroup.shortNameEnglish) as PracticeGroup, isPrimary as isPrimary, usernameRev.timestamp as revtstmp,
usernameRev.username as changedBy from LicenseeclasspracticegroupAud where (:personID is null or licensee.personFk=:personID )
getStatusChangeDetails.countQueryString: select count(*)  from LicenseeclasspracticegroupAud where (:personID is null or licensee.personFk=:personID )

licenseeChangesChart.name: licenseeChangesChart
licenseeChangesChart.description: Get licensee changes count by Request Created Persons
licenseeChangesChart.queryString: select CREATED_BY,count(*) as Changes_Count from RMS.LICENSEECLASSPRACTICEGROUP_APPROVALS   group by CREATED_BY
licenseeChangesChart.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select CREATED_BY,count(*) as Changes_Count from RMS.LICENSEECLASSPRACTICEGROUP_APPROVALS   group by CREATED_BY) wmTempTable

updateStatus.name: updateStatus
updateStatus.description: Update the Status after approving/rejecting a request
updateStatus.queryString: update RMS.LICENSEECLASSPRACTICEGROUP_APPROVALS set STATUS=:status where PK=:pk
